events.name: Brooklyn Nets at San Antonio Spurs

highlights.headline: Brooklyn Nets vs. San Antonio Spurs: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Brooklyn Nets vs. San Antonio Spurs: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brooklyn Nets vs. San Antonio Spurs: Game Highlights) 2025/10/26 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Victor Wembanyama had 31 points, 14 rebounds and six blocks, and the San Antonio Spurs recovered after blowing a 26-point lead to beat the Brooklyn Nets 118-107 on Sunday and remain unbeaten.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wembanyama has 31 points and 14 rebounds as Spurs remain unbeaten with 118-107 victory over Nets

video.headline: Brooklyn Nets vs. San Antonio Spurs: Game Highlights

highlights.headline: Boston Celtics vs. Detroit Pistons: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Boston Celtics vs. Detroit Pistons: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Boston Celtics vs. Detroit Pistons: Game Highlights) 2025/10/26 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Cade Cunningham scored 25 points and Jalen Duren had 24 to help the Detroit Pistons hold off the Boston Celtics for a 119-113 win on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cunningham scores 25, helps Pistons overcome slow start and Brown's 41 points to top Celtics 119-113

video.headline: Boston Celtics vs. Detroit Pistons: Game Highlights

highlights.headline: Milwaukee Bucks vs. Cleveland Cavaliers: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Milwaukee Bucks vs. Cleveland Cavaliers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Milwaukee Bucks vs. Cleveland Cavaliers: Game Highlights) 2025/10/26 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Donovan Mitchell scored 24 points, including 10 in the fourth quarter, Evan Mobley added 23 and the Cleveland Cavaliers held off the Milwaukee Bucks 118-113 on Sunday night to win their home opener.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mitchell scores 24, Mobley goes perfect at free throw line as Cavaliers edge Bucks 118-113

headlines.description: — Norman Powell scored 29 points, Bam Adebayo added 19 points and 13 rebounds and the Miami Heat beat the New York Knicks 115-107 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Powell scores 29 as Heat beat Knicks 115-107 in Miami's home opener

highlights.headline: Charlotte Hornets vs. Washington Wizards: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Charlotte Hornets vs. Washington Wizards: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Charlotte Hornets vs. Washington Wizards: Game Highlights) 2025/10/26 ESHEET

headlines.description: — LaMelo Ball had 38 points, 13 rebounds and 13 assists for his 11th career triple-double, and the Charlotte Hornets erased a double-digit halftime deficit Sunday night to defeat the Washington Wizards 139-113.
headlines.shortLinkText: LaMelo Ball's triple-double helps Hornets handle Wizards, 139-113
